properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Injili yake Bwana,
ni neno lake Mungu,
injili iende mbele,
aah aah aah. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Injili iende mbele,
aah ahh ahh.
Injili iende mbele,
ni neno la wokovu,
aah ahh ahh. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ni neno lenye mwanga,
ni neno lenye nguvu,
ni neno la amani,
aah aah aah. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Injili yaokoa,
injili yaponyesha,
injili ya dumisha,
aah aah aah. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mkristu jiandae,
kusikiliza neno,
neno lenye uzima,
aah aah aah. x2
